name: Hatchet Honeymoon
overview: To claim your inheritance, you and your beautiful young bride must spend the first week of your honeymoon in the old ancestral mansion of a cold stormswept island. You must conceive an heir. If your wife fails to become pregnant this week, you lose the family fortune. You anticipate a week of post-nuptual discovery, little realizing the horror that awaits you within the dark walls.
